entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
